summary: Automated test suite for the Certbot Route53 DNS plugin, covering the authenticator's challenge handling, cleanup, preference reporting, additional information requests, and error scenarios, as well as the DNS clientâ€™s capabilities to create TXT records, resolve zone IDs, and wait for DNS propagation.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the Certbot Route53 integration to ensure reliable automated SSL/TLS certificate issuance via DNS-01 challenges on AWS Route53, preventing deployment failures and simplifying certificate management for users.
